title: After 14 years, Tamil Nadu records double-digit economic growth in real terms
description:
After a gap of 14 years, Tamil Nadu has recorded a double-digit economic growth rate in real terms during 2024-25 with 11.19%, according to the revised estimates of the Union Ministry of Statistics and Programme Implementation for various States.

In 2010-11, the State registered 13.12%. Coincidenta...

title: RBI Monetary Policy Meeting August 2025: RBI maintains status quo at 5.50%
description:
RBI Monetary Policy Meeting August 2025: RBI maintains status quo at 5.50% RBI Monetary Policy Meeting August 2025: The Reserve Bank of India has already reduced the repo rate by 25 basis points (bps) each in February and April, and 50 bps in June.
